item.title: Mechanistic Interpretability of Fine-Tuned Protein Language Models for Nanobody Thermostability Prediction
item.description:
T. Murakami, Y. Hashidate, and Y. Matsunaga published a new preprint on bioRxiv.

Read the full paper: Mechanistic Interpretability of Fine-Tuned Protein Language Models for Nanobody Thermostability Prediction
